General.Name: Hexaom
General.Description: Hexaom S.A. engages in the home building and renovation businesses in France. It also provides real estate and land development, and extension services, as well as financing brokerage services. The company was incorporated in 1919 and is headquartered in Alençon, France. Hexaom S.A. is a subsidiary of MFC Prou-Investissements SAS.
